title: Long-term use of prescription opioids for non-cancer pain and mortality: a population-based, propensity-weighted cohort study
content:
Publication date: July 2024

Source: Public Health, Volume 232

Author(s): I. Hurtado, C. Robles, A. García-Sempere, F. Llopis-Cardona, F. Sánchez-Sáez, C. Rodríguez-Bernal, S. Peiró, G. Sanfélix-Gimeno
